other_tests.findings: Heterozygous insertion of an adenosine in exon 3 altering codon 85, resulting in a frame shift and a stop codon in exon 4.
Reduced Gs/H9251-L protein level to about 50%, while Gs/H9251-S level was unaltered.
Diminished Gs/H9251 protein activity in erythrocyte membranes to about 75% of normal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Both reduced activity and the mutation were also found in the mother and affected younger brother.

other_tests.findings: Detected unchanged Gs/H9251-S variants, reduced expression of Gs/H9251-L transcripts from the maternal allele.
Demonstrated the existence of Gs/H9251-L mRNA from the paternal allele and a strong reduction of the maternally derived mutation bearing transcript.
